person.persName: Drury William Standrod (Trigg County, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster. Kentucky native. Son of Bazzel Standrod and Rebecca Rogers Standrod. Educated in a subscription school in Trigg County. Married to Catherine Francis Campbell Standrod on October 14, 1853. Father of Rebecca F. Standrod, Samuel E. Standrod, Mollie Standrod, and Lettia Standrod. Member of the Lutheran Church. Merchant in Trigg County from 1847 to 1870. Postmaster of Rock Castle, Kentucky, from 1853 to 1870.
